From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

I just uploaded more scenarios into my set.  It now includes #116-151 
and #175.  Yes, some of the stories suck.

Yes, there is a group actively working on setting up a gladiator 
tournament.  I'm hoping that we'll be ready by the 1st week of January 
for the tournament.

I would, also, for the record, state that I, as a moderator, receive a 
small email message alerting me everytime someone uploads a file to 
this group and I bet I'll receive one every time a picture is uploaded 
into the Photos section.  I'm calling for using that space for screen 
shots of scenarios.  If I find anything that I consider inappropriate 
in the photos section, I will consider excercising some of my 
moderator options.
